dcterms:description: BERT is a pre-trained model that uses deep bidirectional transformers for language understanding, which is utilized in the federated machine learning system for tasks such as next-word prediction.
dcterms:title: BERT

O. Simeone

dcterms:description: The Iterative Federated Clustering Algorithm (IFCA) is a framework for clustering client devices based on their gradient loss values, enhancing training efficiency in federated learning.
dcterms:title: Iterative Federated Clustering Algorithm (IFCA)

dcterms:description: Federated Augmentation (FAug) is a communication-efficient on-device machine learning method that employs data augmentation techniques under non-IID private data conditions.
dcterms:title: Federated Augmentation (FAug)

An Xu

dcterms:description: MultiModel is a framework for privacy-preserving asynchronous federated learning algorithms designed for multi-party vertically collaborative learning.
dcterms:title: MultiModel

dcterms:description: Swarm Learning is a decentralized and confidential machine learning approach that utilizes edge computing and blockchain-based peer-to-peer networking.

dcterms:description: IBM Federated Learning is a framework that manages client parties in federated learning with components for protocol handling, connection, model management, and local training.

dcterms:description: Helios is a framework for heterogeneity-aware federated learning that dynamically balances collaboration among clients to improve model performance.
